label.h3: “The value registered for the third antenatal care visit (ANC 3), cannot be higher than the value registered for the second ANC visit (ANC 2)” is an example of a:

div.p: One way to check the quality of the data entered in DHIS2 is by testing them against predefined validation rules. The validation rule analysis tests validation rules against the data registered in the system. Validation violations are reported when the condition defined in the validation rule expression is not met, which means when the condition is false.
